means: [医][印地]黑热病：典型的内脏利什曼病

sentence.Network_en: Azar, who learned the trick years ago from another clerk.
sentence.Network_cn: 他几年前从另一个职员那学来了这一招.

sentence.Network_en: Kala: [ puts Tarzan's hand to his chest ] What do you feel?
sentence.Network_cn: 卡拉: ( 把泰山的手放在他的胸前 ) 你感觉到了什麽?

sentence.Network_en: Kala: [ puts Tarzan's head by her chest ] Come here.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡拉: ( 把泰山的手放在她的胸前)放在这儿.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Assamese, from kālā 'black' + āzār 'disease' (because of the bronzing of the skin often associated with it)
